snippet: New York City is testing its first playground for adults, at Macombs Dam Park in the Bronx, hoping it will succeed where treadmills have failed in combating rising rates of obesity.
abstract: New York City is testing its first playground for adults, at Macombs Dam Park in the Bronx, hoping it will succeed where treadmills have failed in combating rising rates of obesity; city plans to bring as many as two dozen more such playgrounds, essentially outdoor gyms, to neighborhoods across the five boroughs by 2014.
lead_paragraph: New York City is testing its first playground for adults, at Macombs Dam Park in the Bronx, hoping it will succeed where treadmills have failed in combating rising rates of obesity.

headline.seo: New York Introduces Its First Adult Playground
headline.main: Mom, Dad, This Playground’s for You
headline.print_headline: Mom, Dad, This Playground’s for You
